resources.string: StoryTeller
Settings
edu.tamu.storyteller
user_name_pref
user_age_pref
Ants are very hardworking. They work in teams to bring food. Be hardworking!
While happiness and intelligence are good, it is important to be good to others. Be peaceful!
When someone is in trouble and they come to you, try to help!
The dove is now in trouble. He was good and helped the ant when she needed it. Do your best to return help and favors!
Be nice and help others. If someone helped you, return the favor!
One day, an ant was searching for some water after a long morning of work.
After walking around for some time, she came to a spring. To reach the spring, she had to climb up a blade of glass.
While making her way up, she slipped and fell into the water.
A dove was up a nearby tree enjoying the afternoon.
The dove soon saw that the ant was in trouble.
The dove quickly plucked off a leaf and dropped it into the water near the struggling ant.
The ant moved towards the leaf and climbed up there. Soon it carried her safely to dry ground.
Just at that time, a hunter nearby was throwing out his net towards the dove, hoping to trap it.
Guessing what he was about to do, the ant quickly bit him on the heel. Feeling pain, the hunter dropped his net. The dove was quick to fly away to safety.
Hint: Remember, the ant has been working all morning.
Hint: Remember, doves are always good to others.
Hint: Remember, the ant is in trouble and could drown!
Hint: Remember, the dove recently helped the ant.
Hint: Everyone needs help in some moments.
What is a good quality of the ant?
Lazy
Hardworking
Thirsty
What human value does the dove represent?
Peace
Happiness
Intelligence
What should the dove do?
Wait, the ant will be fine.
Help the ant
Leave and go to another tree
Should the ant help the dove in return?
No, it\'s the dove\'s problem.
No, wait and watch.
Yes, she should.
What did you learn from the story?
Help back those who helped you.
Others never need help.
You never need help.
Moral of the Story: One good turn deserves another.
